verses.text: We give thanks \w to|strong="H7892"\w* you, God. We give thanks, for your Name is near. Men tell about your wondrous works.
When \w I|strong="H8034"\w* choose \w the|strong="H3034"\w* appointed time, \w I|strong="H8034"\w* \w will|strong="H8034"\w* judge blamelessly.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* earth \w and|strong="H3947"\w* \w all|strong="H3947"\w* \w its|strong="H3588"\w* inhabitants quake. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* firmly hold \w its|strong="H3588"\w* pillars. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w I|strong="H3605"\w* said \w to|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* arrogant, “Don’t boast!” \w I|strong="H3605"\w* said \w to|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wicked, “Don’t lift \w up|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* horn.

Don’t \w lift|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w your|strong="H7311"\w* \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* \w on|strong="H7161"\w* \w high|strong="H7311"\w*. Don’t speak \w with|strong="H7161"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stiff neck.”

\w For|strong="H7311"\w* neither from \w the|strong="H1696"\w* east, nor from \w the|strong="H1696"\w* west, nor \w yet|strong="H1696"\w* from \w the|strong="H1696"\w* south, comes \w exaltation|strong="H7311"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* judge. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* puts \w down|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H4057"\w* \w lifts|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w another|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s hand \w there|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cup, full \w of|strong="H8199"\w* foaming wine mixed \w with|strong="H8199"\w* spices. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* pours \w it|strong="H3588"\w* out. \w Indeed|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* wicked \w of|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth drink \w and|strong="H2088"\w* drink \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3588"\w* \w its|strong="H3588"\w* \w very|strong="H2088"\w* dregs.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* declare \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w forever|strong="H3605"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sing \w praises|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Jacob.

\w I|strong="H5046"\w* \w will|strong="H3290"\w* cut off \w all|strong="H5769"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* horns \w of|strong="H2167"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* wicked, \w but|strong="H3290"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* horns \w of|strong="H2167"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* righteous \w shall|strong="H3290"\w* \w be|strong="H5769"\w* \w lifted|strong="H3290"\w* up.
